articles.title: Dell's first Windows 11 on ARM laptop is SHOCKINGLY affordable - Windows Central
articles.description: The new Dell Inspiron 14 has a Snapdragon 8cx SoC and is cheaper than you think.

  • It's available to buy now from Dell for just $499.
